DC CODE ยง 2-1517.31

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: "Behavioral health" means a person's overall social, emotional, and psychological well-being and development.

"Health education standards" means the specific learning requirements related to health that the Office of the State Superintendent of Education requires students to learn at each academic level, from pre-K through 12th grade.

part.text: Early Childhood and School-Based Behavioral Health Infrastructure.
